attributes.action: Give Jack Bauer The Day Off.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over The Course Of five and a half days, we the undersigned think that Jack Bauer has done MORE than his fair share to ensure our safety and wellbeing. It is about time that CTU and the American Government; and the world in General, Phone Someone else the next time and Give Jack the day off to spend some quality time with Kim.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
